title: An Act concerning nondisclosure agreements relative to sexual harassment and discrimination

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Sullivan-Almeida of Abington, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2007) of Alyson M. Sullivan-Almeida relative to nondisclosure agreements relative to sexual harassment and discrimination.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
